channel.title: Horse Riding Manga
channel.description: A digital archive about horse riding mangas.

item.title: Silver Spoon Volume 1
item.description: Yugo Hachiken enrolls at Ezonoo Agricultural High School to escape the academic pressure of city life. What he didn't expect was to have to deal with early mornings, animals, and a lifestyle completely different from what he was used to.

item.title: Silver Spoon Volume 2
item.description: Hachiken faces his first experience with the death of a farm animal, which makes him reflect deeply on the origin of food and the hard work of farmers.

item.title: Silpheed Volume 1
item.description: In the distant future, humanity fights for survival against an alien threat. A young pilot is chosen to crew the most advanced combat ship ever built: the Silpheed.

item.title: Silpheed Volume 2
item.description: The conflict escalates to critical levels. The Silpheed pilot must face the leader of the invasion in a duel that will decide the fate of all humanity.
